document_data.name: Azhakar
document_data.mainbody: '''Azhakar''' was a [[talking bird]] who lived in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate, in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.History: Azhakar was found living with a [[singing tree]] during the time of [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir]]'s great-grandfather. As of 1367 DR, he lived in the gardens of the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] with the same singing tree.
document_data.Activities: Azhakar would frequently provide answers to important questions posed by the [[Grand Caliph]]. Others might be lucky enough to get an answer as well if Azhakar believed them worthy.{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|88}}
